amendment.description: Page 62, after line 2, insert the following new section: SEC. 609. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to fund any portion of the International activities at the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy of the Department of Energy in China.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 79 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used for any portion of the International activities at the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy of the Department of Energy in China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A081) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A081) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A081) offered by Mr. Sherman.
